input.activity_signal: Company is listed as "Active status in state records" per California Secretary of State (web search results). Recent $140 Million strategic growth investment announced July 25, 2024 for AI agent development (web search snippet). Company website found via search results showing current business operations focused on AI-powered omnichannel communications.
input.product_summary: IntelePeer provides enterprise-grade, AI-powered omnichannel communications solutions that help businesses automate customer interactions and implement voice over internet protocol services.
